column2: Causes a projectile to be controlled telekinetically
Launch yourself forwards with a burst of speed
Projects your cast to where your mind focuses
Decreases the speed at which a projectile flies through the air
Allows you to project your vision
Sharply reduces the damage of a projectile
Anchors a projectile where it was fired
Casts a projectile independent of any modifiers from its cast block. Has certain magical properties...
An accelerating magical dart that pierces soft materials
Makes a projectile cast copies of itself forwards
Imbues a projectile with a wispy spirit
Makes a projectile rapidly fire weak shots at nearby foes
Makes a projectile occasionally shoot powerful shots at nearby foes
Gives a projectile a trail of soil
A small bullet formed of ice magic
A large bullet formed of ice magic
A small bullet formed of ice magic that casts another spell upon expiring
A large bullet formed of ice magic that casts another spell upon expiring
Increases a projectile's damage based on the number of empty slots in the wand
Cast inside a wand to unshuffle it at the cost of reduced stats. Spell is voided upon use!
Cast inside a wand to shuffle it, but greatly improve its stats. Spell is voided upon use!
Cast inside a wand to increase the amount of spells fired per cast. Spell is voided upon use!
Cast inside a wand to increase the velocity of projectiles fired from it. Spell is voided upon use!
Cast inside a wand to increase the wand's total spell capacity. Spell is voided upon use!
Cast inside a wand to decrease the cast delay. Spell is voided upon use!
Cast inside a wand to decrease the reload time. Spell is voided upon use!
Cast inside a wand to increase the accuracy. Spell is voided upon use!
Cast inside a wand to increase its mana capacity. Spell is voided upon use!
Cast inside a wand to increase its mana charge speed. Spell is voided upon use!
Cast inside a wand to turn its first spell into an always cast. Spell is voided upon use!
Cast inside a wand to turn its first always cast into a spell. Spell is voided upon use!
Causes your projectile to gain damage the longer it's alive
Makes a projectile always do a critical hit on charmed enemies
Makes a projectile always do a critical hit on electrocuted enemies
Makes a projectile always do a critical hit on frozen enemies
Gives a projectile a trail of stinging frost
Gives a projectile a trail of pure darkness
Increases the critical damage of a spell
Increases the damage done by a projectile slightly for each projectile spell on the wand
Cast a spell with increased damage and material penetration
Cast a spell which sticks to surfaces it hits
Remove all particle emitters from a projectile
Spawns a mass of rapidly growing nature
A projectile will be repelled by nearby enemies
Fires a deadly stream of flames when you hold alt fire. (0.2s cooldown)
Encases a projectile in a deflective shield
Cast all remaining spells in a circular pattern
Summon a magical phenomenon that casts a spell when you stop casting
Projectiles gain a trail of barriers
A blast of crackling red energy
A spark bolt that casts another spell upon expiring
The next spell is skipped if the spell isn't cast by the player
The next spell is skipped if the alt fire key isn't held down
Causes a projectile to zip away from walls
An energy orb that casts two spells - one after a short delay and another after a longer delay.
A slow but powerful orb of energy that casts all remaining spells with a delay dependent on your cast delay
Casts a copy of every spell in the last wand
Cycles through the wand, casting copies of spells.
Your held wand fires when you're surrounded
Your held wand fires when you equip your wand
Your held wand fires when you're on the verge of death
Your held wand fires when you're hurt
Your held wand fires when you're around projectiles
A rapidly accelerating icicle which impales itself into terrain
Makes any hard, solid materials within a projectile's range explode violently
Makes any fluids within a projectile's range turn earthly
Makes any soft, powdery materials within a projectile's range dissolve into water
Makes any soft, powdery materials within a projectile's range become hard like metal
A short lived spark of electricity
Purge thy satiety; allow oneself to feast again!
An expanding circle of a random material
Creates a rain of a random material
Transmutes everything in a short radius into a random material, including walls, creatures... and you
Transmute drops of a random material from nothing
Summons a large body of a random material below the caster
Summon a heavy anvil which can be kicked around and even moved by explosions
Conjures a magical turret that casts spells from your wand
Conjures a magical turret that casts spells from your wand, but only when enemies are in range
Causes a spell to cast a perfect copy of itself on death
Creates a field that duplicates projectiles passing through it
Slowly sap nearby energy shields (including your own)
Projectiles are affected by a very low terminal velocity
A projectile has reduced terminal velocity and added lifetime
Simultaneously casts 6 spells with low accuracy
Simultaneously casts 8 spells with low accuracy
Creates a soothing rain that cures your wounds
Cast an uncontrolled burst of projectiles
Summons a tiny ethereal being to your help. It will fire protective shots that grant you an energy shield.
A feral slash that sucks in your foes
An acidic claw that melts your foes
A sword of pure light that slices through enemies with such grace that it doesn't damage the environment
Reverses the direction that a spell flies
Small Teleport Bolt with Expiration Trigger
A shortlived magical bolt that moves you and casts another spell wherever it ends up flying
Projectiles leave a devastating trail of deathly crosses
Projectiles gain a trail of explosions
Makes a projectile rapidly fire spirit bullets
Makes a projectile fire spirit bullets from its sides
Makes a projectile fire spirit bullets when it dies
Makes a projectile fire spirit bullets in a circle
Causes hit enemies to spray out bullets
A chilling orb which shatters on death
Adds or removes a random amount of mana to the wand
A projectile will deal 2x damage to wet enemies and freeze them
A projectile will deal 2x damage to bloody enemies and poison them
A projectile will deal 2x damage to oiled enemies and engulf them in flames
A projectile will blind anyone it hits, including you...
Transmute globs of polymorphine from nothing
All your damage is halved, then converted to healing, and your projectile can hit you. The next spell costs twice as much mana.
Hurl some of your hard earned gold at the enemy. Requires 10 gold
Summons a swirling phenomenon that fires 5 bursts of astral energy
Affected projectiles will explode into dangerous acid
He really cemented himself as a household name
Randomizes the lifetime of a projectile
Casts all remaining spells in sequence
Your projectile fires out random projectiles
Your wand casts spells in order
The next spell costs half as much mana
The next spell deals 5x more damage, but costs 3x more mana
Fire all remaining spells with stat improvements proportional to spells drawn.
Cast a spell that drains 30 mana every second, but doesn't die unless your wand runs out of mana.
A spell will follow your cursor
Dramatically reduce the next spell's cast delay and recharge time, but it will cost double mana
Cast the next spell with a 3x higher mana cost, but it can not directly damage you
A balloon that's filled with a material from your last potion
Projectiles rotate and accelerate towards the nearest target in front of them
Cast 2 spells that keep moving in the direction they were cast
Cast a spell with unrivaled bouncing potential
Kick nearby projectiles to launch them forwards. Costs 5 mana per projectile
Cast a spell which leaves sturdy wood in its wake
Projectiles will be repelled from the caster
A projectile will make the enemies it hits drunk
Projectiles deal their damage in a radius around them, but cost 2x more mana to cast
Increases the damage done by a projectile every time it bounces
Reverses the flow of mana in your body, giving you a quick and painless death.
A denser energy shield which turns towards projectiles.
Toss a coin in the air. Requires 10 gold. Maybe you can shoot it?
Toss a coin in the air when you alt fire. Requires 10 gold. Maybe you can shoot it?
Forces a projectile on a vertical path, but increases its damage
Creates arcs of concrete between projectiles. Make sure not to get stuck! (requires 2 projectile spells)
Adds additional mana when you fire consecutively.
Reduces time between spellcasts when you fire consecutively.
Adds burning damage when you fire consecutively, but you may catch on fire!
Bolsters your defences while you fire consecutively
Greatly reduces the time between spellcasts, with an increasing chance to malfunction
Causes a projectile to spray confetti everywhere!
Cast 5 spells that are held in place in front of your wand
Reduces the knockback of a projectile
Creates arcs of barriers between projectiles (requires 2 projectile spells)
Makes a projectile erase liquids as it flies
Fire the next spell three times in quick succession based on current cast delay
A projectile will teleport you to where it expires.
All projectiles after this spell will be skipped.
No projectiles after this spell will be skipped.
All spells after this spell will be skipped.
No spells after this spell will be skipped.
Modifiers and multicasts after this spell will be skipped.
All projectiles will be skipped if too many of your own projectiles exist.
Summons a flask filled with a random material
Cast a spell on yourself to teleport ahead!
Cast a spell on yourself to teleport ahead?
Redirects a projectile every time it bounces.
Redirects a projectile towards your cursor every time it bounces.
Redirects a projectile towards enemies occasionally
Projectiles will begin homing after a delay.
When cast, this spell will mimic the spell after it!
Cast a spell on yourself to become a fluffy critter!
You hear an enchanting song while holding your wand!
A magical hook which draws you in when it lands!
Projectiles fire out hooks after a period of time.
Causes hit enemies to uncontrollably grapple around.
Fires a magical hook when you alt fire. (0.5s cooldown)
Your projectile fires out truly random projectiles
Your projectile duplicates hit creatures. Uncopyable. Doubles mana costs.
Burns the very fabric of magic to empower your spells!
The next spell instead casts an arcanely adjacent spell..?
When cast, this spell will weave a virtual copy of the next spell, then draw it!
When cast, this spell will weave two virtual copies of the next spell, then draw one!
The next spell instead casts something wildly different!
Tears the next spell to the very fibres of mana that compose it, and sews it in reverse???
Balances the next spell's recharge time and cast delay.
A glistening axe which hastens your wand as long as it is stuck in an enemy.
Store a spell which will be fired when you take damage
A cruel hook which drags the first creature it strikes
Instantly recharge your wand when you get hurt! (0.5s cooldown)
A growing inferno which burns mana to expand, incinerating anyone in it's range!
Fires a cruel hook when you alt fire. (0.5s cooldown)
A ghostly hook which draws you in when it comes to a stop, even through terrain!
Fires a bomb which destroys ground efficiently when you alt fire. (1.7s cooldown)
Loop cast has been changed in v0.52, to be way less lame. Latter is correct.
When cast, the wand will only fire the following spells until you switch wands.
Cast the next spell until your wand runs out of mana, up to an amount of times equal to your wand's capacity.
Every other wand cast will be in reverse order, but all mana costs are halved!
An otherwordly knife which has a chance to restore spell charges if it takes lives.
A block of solid ice, cold enough to the touch that it hurts.
Adds increasing mana depending on how long since this spell was last cast, up to 120 after a second.
A ''harmless'' ray of mental magic which causes it's victim to convulse and spasm with immense pain
Your wand's mana regeneration is replaced with the average of all your wands' mana regeneration stats.
A blazing ray of hellish flames, which deals 100% of it's damage as fire damage.
A wave of magic which applies on-hit modifiers to enemies in a large area, without dealing direct damage.
A hallowed beam of divine light
Projectile spells will use charges from this spell before their own.
Use a spell's mana cost in HP instead of charges, given you have over half health.
A projectile consumes 1% of your wand's mana to deal bonus electric damage after hitting an enemy.
Makes a projectile cast deeper copies of itself in random directions, at the cost of mana.
Skips all remaining spells if your wand is not full on mana.
Skips all remaining spells if you're above 25% HP.
Sets an arcane trap which triggers the next spell, or an explosion if there is no spell after it.
An axe which sparkles like stars, it restores 60 mana for every non-lethal strike on an enemy.
A possessed axe, it seeks out foes and corrupts their spirits, leaving a deathly ghost postmortem.
A strong jet of water, with 100% more wandbuilding value!
A streak of vile energy which seeks out foes, gaining damage with each hit.
Projectiles deal a large amount of damage after a delay.
A miniature orb of void that consumes matter
Three miniature orbs of void that consume matter
Five miniature orbs of void that consume matter
A swirling vortex of infernal fire!
Summons three bombs that do not destroy ground very efficiently
Summons a bomb that bores a hole away from it's caster
A projectile which explodes from fright near foes, that casts another spell upon expiring
A slicing wind that bounces erratically, cutting both friends and foes!
Causes a projectile to redirect itself once when you fire.
Causes a projectile to redirect itself every time you fire.
Conjure an enchanted eyeball which you see out of, only one may exist at a time. Costs 5 hitpoints to cast. Hold 'down' for 3 seconds to cancel.
Hallowed be thy Handgrenades, Blessed be thy Bombs, Divine be thy Devastation... Strike with the force of a god.
Transmutes everything in a short radius into grass, including walls, creatures... and you.
Esoteric Name Which Should Only Be Visible In The Progress Menu
Funny fourth wall breaking meta description here.
Casts every spell from your inventory.
Move at the speed of light, harming everything in your way.
Fire a salvo of blades made of pure radiance.
Summons a polymorphine tank. What the fuck is wrong with you.
Deals additional damage to frozen enemies, and shatters them into lethal ice on kill!
Move faster while you have empty slots.
Deals an additional 30% damage to slimy-aligned foes.
Deals an additional 30% damage to robotic-aligned foes.
Deals an additional 30% damage to hiisi-aligned foes.
Deals an additional 30% damage to mage-aligned foes.
Deals an additional 30% damage to ghostly-aligned foes.
A thorny blast of nature that causes enemies to take increased damage!
You gain 3 ice damage on kill for 10 seconds, up to a limit of 15 damage.
A wide-range spell that does paltry damage. Pair with modifiers!
A spark of magic that attracts other swarm bolts on hit.
Kills have a chance to restore spell charges.
Spells recoup charges over time. Disabled while inactive.
This wand fights for you, BUT this wand is uncastable.
The next spell is an always cast on all wands, BUT this wand is uncastable.
Reduced damage to all spells, BUT spent mana damages enemies.
1/3 of damage is dealt to ALL targets nearby.
Negates one hit every 15 seconds to ALL targets nearby.
Consumes 10% mana capacity, converting it to 2x damage.
Charge an arcane weapon that fires at all in sight. Maximum of 20 charges.
Charge arcane weapons to distribute 20 shots. Maximum of 20 weapons.
Charge a heavy cannonball that obliterates foes. Maximum of 8 charges.
Charge to absorb projectiles, up to 10 seconds. Absorbed projectiles reduce time. Fires a destructive wave, incurring recharge.
